name: The Black Cat Test Build 2
description:
A year after you and your wife are killed by monsters, a black cat walks across your grave...and by luck...resurrects your spirit from the grave!

You are then given 9 Lives and a whip by the black cat that resurrected your spirit.

You are then sent on a quest to get revenge by killing all the monsters that killed you and your wife a year earlier.

Will you be able to kill all the monsters and finally rest In peace?
